Some Muge (1959-1997) bụ onye Kenya na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge.
A maara ya nke ọma maka mmeri mbụ nke Kenya na IAAF World Cross Country Championships, tupu ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ

Nke a mere mgbe ọ meriri ọla nchara na ogologo ọsọ nke 1983 World Cross Country Championships. Kenya nwetakwara ọla nchara na asọmupi otu. O meriri ọla nchara nke otu ahụ na 1981 World Cross Country Championships, mgbe ọ gwụchara nke 57 na ọsọ ahụ. Na 1986 World Cross Country Championships ọ mechara nke asatọ na asọmupi ahụ wee merie ọla edo na asọmupi otu, na 1987 World Cross Country Championship ọ mechara nke ise na asọmupi wee merie ihe nrite ọla edo ọzọ. O nwetakwara ọla nchara na 10,000 mita na All-Africa Games, wee bụrụ onye nke iri abụọ na abụọ na 10,000 mita n'asọmupi World Championships nke afọ 1987.
